<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scheduledNode - As nodes are scheduled, we look to see if there are any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// successor nodes that have a single unscheduled predecessor.  If so, that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// single predecessor has a higher priority, since scheduling it will make</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the node available.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AdjustPriorityOfUnscheduledPreds - One of the predecessors of SU was just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// scheduled.  If SU is not itself available, then there is at least one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// predecessor node that has not been scheduled yet.  If SU has exactly ONE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unscheduled predecessor, we want to increase its priority: it getting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// scheduled will make this node available, so it is better than some other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// node of the same priority that will not make a node available.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a90272947a7dad8b452be533c490a5e89">isAvailable</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All preds scheduled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;OnlyAvailablePred = getSingleUnscheduledPred(SU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!OnlyAvailablePred || !OnlyAvailablePred-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a90272947a7dad8b452be533c490a5e89">isAvailable</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Okay, we found a single predecessor that is available, but not scheduled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since it is available, it must be in the priority queue.  First remove it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/latencypriorityqueue/#a65b10a2416edce73bca7c46839268b41">remove</a>(OnlyAvailablePred);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reinsert the node into the priority queue, which recomputes its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NumNodesSolelyBlocking value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/latencypriorityqueue/#a2e3b6da384da19b92dc290a8051194c6">push</a>(OnlyAvailablePred);</span></CodeLine>
